name: Superior Reactor Core
desc: Allows a ship to dissipate hard flux even when shields are active.

name: R.U.N.E
desc:
The Ships internal and outer frame is incased
in a Reinforced ulterior nanoalloy exoskeleton.

The Thulium infused alloy and it's 
self-restructering shapeconsintent memory 
allows for almost instant self-repairing
abilities of engine and weapon systems.
